title: Trailblazer League/Tasks/Karamja

properties.name: description
properties.value: Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

content:
Contents

  • 1 Easy
  • 2 Medium
  • 3 Hard
  • 4 Elite
  • 5 Master

Easy[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

With 9 tasks available, there are a total of 90 league points that can be earned from easy tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Receive an Agility Arena Ticket Receive an Agility Arena Ticket from the Brimhaven Agility Arena. N/A N/A
Catch a Karambwanji Catch a Karambwanji on Karamja. 5 Fishing N/A
Defeat a TzHaar Defeat any TzHaar in Mor Ul Rek. N/A N/A
Receive a Slayer Task From Duradel Receive a Slayer Task From Duradel in Shilo Village. 5 Combat level, 1 Slayer N/A
Defeat a Greater Demon on Karamja Defeat a Greater Demon on Karamja. N/A N/A
Complete the Easy Karamja Diary Complete all of the easy tasks in the Karamja Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Fill a Crate With Bananas Fill a crate with Bananas for Luthas at Musa Point. N/A N/A
Pick a Pineapple on Karamja Pick a Pineapple on Karamja. N/A N/A
Enter the Brimhaven Dungeon Enter the Brimhaven Dungeon. N/A N/A

Medium[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 50 league points upon completion.

With 8 tasks available, there are a total of 400 league points that can be earned from medium tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Buy a Snapdragon From Pirate Jackie the Fruit Buy a Snapdragon From Pirate Jackie the Fruit in Brimhaven. N/A 10 Agility arena tickets
Catch a Salmon on Karamja Catch a Salmon on Karamja. 30 Fishing N/A
Craft 50 Nature Runes Craft 50 Nature Runes at the Nature Altar. 44 Runecraft N/A
Defeat a Steel Dragon on Karamja Defeat a Steel Dragon on Karamja. N/A N/A
Complete the Medium Karamja Diary Complete all of the medium tasks in the Karamja Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Enter the Tai Bwo Wannai Hardwood Grove Enter the Hardwood Grove in Tai Bwo Wannai. N/A 100 Trading sticks
Equip a Matching Tribal Mask and Broodoo Shield Equip a matching Tribal Mask and Broodoo Shield. N/A N/A
Equip a Full Tai Bwo Wannai Villager Set Equip a full set of Tai Bwo Wannai villager clothing. N/A N/A

Hard[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 100 league points upon completion.

With 15 tasks available, there are a total of 1,500 league points that can be earned from hard tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Cook 100 Karambwans Cook 100 Karambwans. 30 Cooking N/A
Take a Shortcut Across the Shilo Village River Use the Stepping Stones Agility Shortcut in Shilo Village. 77 Agility Requires Medium Karamja Diary
Catch 100 Karambwans Catch 100 Karambwans on Karamja. 65 Fishing N/A
Check a grown Calquat Tree Check the health of a Calquat Tree you've grown on Karamja. 72 Farming N/A
Equip a Full Obsidian Armour Set Equip a full set of Obsidian armour. 60 Defence N/A
Survive a Hit From TzTok-Jad Without Prayer Survive a Magic or Ranged hit from TzTok-Jad in the Tzhaar Fight Caves without using a protection prayer. N/A N/A
Equip Some Dragon Platelegs or a Dragon Plateskirt Equip either some Dragon Platelegs or a Dragon Plateskirt. 60 Defence N/A
Equip an Obsidian Cape Equip an Obsidian Cape. N/A N/A
Equip a Toktz-Ket-Xil Equip a Toktz-Ket-Xil. 60 Defence N/A
Equip a Tzhaar-Ket-Om Equip a Tzhaar-Ket-Om. 60 Strength N/A
Equip a Toktz-Xil-Ak Equip a Toktz-Xil-Ak. 60 Attack N/A
Equip a Toktz-Xil-Ek Equip a Toktz-Xil-Ek. 60 Attack N/A
Complete the Hard Karamja Diary Complete all of the hard tasks in the Karamja Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Equip a Red Topaz Machete Equip a Red Topaz Machete. N/A N/A
Find a Gout Tuber Find a Gout Tuber in Tai Bwo Wannai. N/A N/A

Elite[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 250 league points upon completion.

With 13 tasks available, there are a total of 3,250 league points that can be earned from elite tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Receive 60 Agility Arena Tickets With No Mistakes Receive 60 Agility Arena Tickets without missing any pillars. 40 Agility N/A
Pickpocket a Diamond From a TzHaar Pickpocket a Diamond from a TzHaar-Hur. 90 Thieving N/A
Equip a Fire Cape Equip a Fire Cape. N/A N/A
Complete the Fight Caves in 35:00 Complete the Tzhaar Fight Cave in Mor Ul Rek in 35:00 or less. N/A N/A
Sacrifice a Fire Cape to Access the Inferno Sacrifice a Fire Cape to access the Inferno in Mor Ul Rek. N/A N/A
Complete the Fight Caves 5 Times Complete the Tzhaar Fight Cave in Mor Ul Rek 5 times. N/A N/A
Complete the Fight Caves 15 Times Complete the Tzhaar Fight Cave in Mor Ul Rek 15 times. N/A N/A
Complete the Fight Caves 30 Times Complete the Tzhaar Fight Cave in Mor Ul Rek 30 times. N/A N/A
Complete the Inferno 5 Times Complete the Inferno in Mor Ul Rek 5 times. N/A N/A
Complete the Inferno 10 Times Complete the Inferno in Mor Ul Rek 10 times. N/A N/A
Complete the Inferno 20 Times Complete the Inferno in Mor Ul Rek 20 times. N/A N/A
Complete the Elite Karamja Diary Complete all of the elite tasks in the Karamja Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Purchase an Onyx in Mor Ul Rek Purchase an Onyx from an Ore and Gem Store in Mor Ul Rek. N/A N/A

Master[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 500 league points upon completion.

With 4 tasks available, there are a total of 2,000 league points that can be earned from master tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Trade 1,000 Agility Arena Tickets for XP Trade in 1,000 or more Agility Arena Tickets for XP in one go. N/A N/A
Equip an Infernal Cape Equip an Infernal Cape. N/A N/A
Complete the Fight Caves in 25:00 Complete the Tzhaar Fight Cave in Mor Ul Rek in 25:00 or less. N/A N/A
Complete the Inferno in 75:00 Complete the Inferno in Mor Ul Rek in 75:00 or less. N/A N/A
